indications.text: desoximetasone ointment usp , 0.25 % indicated relief inflammatory pruritic manifestations corticosteroid-responsive dermatoses .

contraindications.text: apply thin film desoximetasone ointment usp , 0.25 % affected skin areas twice daily . rub gently .

warningsAndPrecautions: desoximetasone ointment usp , 0.25 % supplied follows : 15 gram tube ( ndc 72162-1414-2 ) 60 gram tube ( ndc 72162-1414-6 ) repackaged/relabeled : bryant ranch prepack , inc. burbank , ca 91504

name: desoximetasone
indications_original: Desoximetasone Ointment USP, 0.25% is indicated for the relief of the inflammatory and pruritic manifestations of corticosteroid-responsive dermatoses.
contraindications_original: Apply a thin film of Desoximetasone Ointment USP, 0.25% to the affected skin areas twice daily. Rub in gently.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Desoximetasone Ointment USP, 0.25% is supplied as follows:
                  15 gram tube (NDC 72162-1414-2)
                  60 gram tube (NDC 72162-1414-6)
                  Repackaged/Relabeled by:
                  Bryant Ranch Prepack, Inc.
                  Burbank, CA 91504
adverseReactions_original: Desoximetasone ointment USP, 0.25% is contraindicated in those patients with a history of hypersensitivity to any of the components of the preparation.
